performanceInterpretation.title: Performance metric interpretation

demoCard.title: Try it out!
demoCard.description: Do you not have a dataset at hand? No worries use our demo data set.

demo.heading: Information about demo dataset
demo.description: A demo data set is loaded below. Based on features of tweets, from the dataset [Twitter15], a BERT-based classifier has predicted whether a tweet is fake news or not. False positive classifications are marker in the FP column and will be used as a performance metric is this use case.

clusters.summary: We found {{clusterCount}} clusters. Cluster with most bias consists of {{biasedCount}} datapoints. The uploaded dataset consists of {{totalCount}} datapoints.
clusters.sizeHint: By adapting the "Minimal cluster size" parameter, the number of clusters can be controlled.

biasedCluster.heading: In the most biased cluster datapoints have:
biasedCluster.accordionTitle: Open details to view feature comparisons to the rest of the dataset

comparison.less: {{value}} less {{feature}} than in the rest of the dataset.
comparison.more: {{value}} more {{feature}} than in the rest of the dataset.
comparison.equal: equal {{feature}} as in the rest of the dataset.

distribution.heading: The "{{variable}}" variable distribution across the different clusters:
